answers.author: Izabela Cieszynski
answers.text:
We have an evaluation form that is distributed after each library program.  Not all attendees respond but we get enough back to get an idea if the program was successful or not.  We do need to revise it.

author: David Dollahon
text: Does anyone have a specific policy or protocol for receiving public feedback on programs that are presented by the staff (primarily Library, Museums, Senior Programs)? This includes methods for receiving feedback, when it is mandated, etc.
title: Public Feedback Policy
